typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Date as string,
		Transaction_Code as string,
		Cashflow_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Description as string,
		Amount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n  FROM [relational].[Asset]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetAssetMaster
source(output(
		GL_Code as string,
		Category as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [GL_Code]\n      ,[Category]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n  FROM [relational].[Chart_of_Account]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetGLCodes
ConvertAmountToValidFormat select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
UnionAll derive(Debit_Credit = case(greaterOrEqual(toDecimal(Amount),0),'DR','CR'),
		Trx_Amount = abs(toDecimal(Amount,18,2)),
		Date = toTimestamp(Date,'dd/MM/yyyy')) ~> SetDerivations
SetDerivations select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Date = Date,
		Trx_Code = Transaction_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		Trx_Desc = GL_Description,
		validation_error = Validation_Error,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForTarget
SelectSourceColumns, SelectFundColumns lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupFundAndAsset
GetAssetMaster select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectFundColumns
SelectGLData, SelectCOAcolumns lookup(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupGLcode
GetGLCodes select(mapColumn(
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Category = Category,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCOAcolumns
TransactionValidFundAsset@ValidFundAsset split(not(isNull(GL_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionTypeGL@(TransactionTypeGL, TransactionTypeCF)
TrimSingleQuoteFromGLcode select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Relation_Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectGLData
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeCF select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCasfFlowData
LookupGLcode split(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitValidGL@(ValidGL, NotValidGL)
LookupFundAndAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Fund_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionValidFundAsset@(ValidFundAsset, InvalidFundAsset)
DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundAssetData
TransactionValidFundAsset@InvalidFundAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Fund or Asset')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund
ConditionalSplitValidGL@NotValidGL derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid GL Code')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL
DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidGLdata
ConditionalSplitValidGL@ValidGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidGLdata
SelectValidGLdata, SelectInvalidGLdata, SelectCasfFlowData, SelectInvalidFundAssetData union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeGL derive(GL_Code = trim(GL_Code,'\'')) ~> TrimSingleQuoteFromGLcode
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Amount = toDecimal(Amount,18,2,'###,###.##')) ~> ConvertAmountToValidFormat
SelectForTarget sink(input(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		validation_error
	)) ~> StagingDB

		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,

		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,

	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
UnionAll derive(Debit_Credit = upper(Debit_Credit),
		Trx_Amount = abs(toDecimal(Amount,18,2))) ~> SetDerivations

		Trx_Date = Date,

	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupGLcode
GetGLCodes select(mapColumn(
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Category = Category,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCOAcolumns
SelectCleanGLCodeData split(not(isNull(GL_Code)) && ( Trx_Type <=> 'Actual' || Trx_Type <=> 'Elimination' || Trx_Type <=> 'GL Adjustment' || Trx_Type <=> 'FX Transaction' ),
	isNull(GL_Code) && (Trx_Type <=> 'CF Adjustment' || Trx_Type <=> 'FX Transaction'),
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionTypeGL@(TransactionTypeGL, TransactionTypeCF, InvalidTransaction)
DerivedColumnInvalidTransaction select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type = Derived_Trx_type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidTransaction
LookupGLcode split(GL_Code == Relation_GL_Code,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitValidGL@(ValidGL, NotValidGL)
LookupFundAndAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Fund_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> TransactionValidFundAsset@(ValidFundAsset, InvalidFundAsset)
DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID = Derived_Fund,
		Asset_ID = Derived_Asset,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundAssetData
TransactionValidFundAsset@InvalidFundAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Fund or Asset'),
		Derived_Fund = iif(isNull(Fund_ID), toString(''), Fund_ID),
		Derived_Asset = iif(isNull(Asset_ID), toString(''), Asset_ID)) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorFund
ConditionalSplitValidGL@NotValidGL derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid GL Code')) ~> DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL
DerivedColumnValidationErrorGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,

		Validation_Error
	),

ConditionalSplitValidGL@ValidGL select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,

		GL_Code,

		Amount,
		Debit_Credit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidGLdata
SelectValidGLdata, SelectInvalidGLdata, SelectInvalidTransaction, SelectInvalidFundAssetData, SelectCashFlow, SelectInvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Amount = toDecimal(Amount,18,2,'###,###.##'),
		Date = toTimestamp(Date,'dd/MM/yyyy')) ~> ConvertAmountToValidFormat
TransactionTypeGL@TransactionTypeCF select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCashFlow
TransactionTypeGL@InvalidTransaction derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid transaction type'),
		Derived_Trx_type = iif(isNull(Trx_Type),toString('Invalid'),Trx_Type)) ~> DerivedColumnInvalidTransaction
ConvertAmountToValidFormat split(not(isNull(Transaction_Code)) && not(isNull(Date)) && not(isNull(Amount)) && (Debit_Credit <=> 'Dr' || Debit_Credit <=> 'Cr'),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckAmoutNotNull@(ValidAmountAndDateAndTrxCode, InvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode)
CheckAmoutNotNull@InvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode derive(Validation_Error = toString('Invalid Transaction Code or Date or Amount or Debit Credit indicator'),
		Derived_Date = iif(isNull(Date),toTimestamp('31/12/9999','dd/MM/yyyy'),Date),
		Derived_Amount = iif(isNull(Amount),toDecimal(0,18,2),Amount),
		Derived_TrxCode = iif(isNull(Transaction_Code),toString('Null Trx Code'),Transaction_Code),
		Derived_Debit_Credit = iif(isNull(Debit_Credit), toString('XX'), Debit_Credit)) ~> DerivedInvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode
DerivedInvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode select(mapColumn(
		Date = Derived_Date,
		Transaction_Code = Derived_TrxCode,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount = Derived_Amount,
		Debit_Credit = Derived_Debit_Credit,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidAmountOrDateOrTrxCode
TransactionValidFundAsset@ValidFundAsset derive(Derived_GL_Code = iif(GL_Code=='\'', toString(null()), trim(GL_Code,'\''))) ~> CleanGLCode
CleanGLCode select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Transaction_Code,
		Cashflow_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		GL_Code = Derived_GL_Code,
		GL_Description,
		Amount,
		Debit_Credit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCleanGLCodeData

		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_name as string,
		Currency as string,
		Fund_ID as string,

		Asset_ID,
